Home → Services → CIPC Annual Returns

CIPC Annual Returns

Keep your company 'Active' and avoid final deregistration. We calculate your turnover fees and file directly.

Est. Turnaround: 1-2 Days
Total Fee
R 590,00

*Includes R 100,00 Gov Fee

Penalties Apply

If you miss your filing month (the anniversary of your registration), CIPC adds a late penalty fee. Two years of non-compliance leads to Deregistration.

Beneficial Ownership

Hard Stop Active: You cannot file this return unless your BO Register is up to date. Update BO Status →

File Before Deregistration

We handle the turnover calculation and CIPC submission.
